FuncDef: This command generates a RSA or DSA private key/public key pairs and store them in a local file in cf3:\system-pki\key

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the key file.
Generates an ECDSA key with a specified curve. Values-secp256r1, secp384r1, secp521r1.
Specifies the key size in bits. Values-512, 1024, 2048. ParamDefault: Default- 2048
Specifies the type of key. Values-rsa, dsa. ParamDefault: Default- rsa
